iti21:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti21:2.1: “Mendicants, when I’ve comprehended the mind of a person whose mind is pure, I understand:
iti21:2.2: ‘If this person were to die right now, they would be raised up to heaven.’
iti21:2.5: Purity of mind is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.”
iti21:2.6: That is what the Buddha said.
